ygData.subject: Re: Bind for Guk?
ygData.msgSnippet: I think this plan smacks of Unrecoverable corpse .    I have a level 35 character and would not dare try this.  Bear in mind that at levle 7 guard s will kill
ygData.messageBody:
I think this plan smacks of "Unrecoverable corpse". I have a level 35
character and would not dare try this. Bear in mind that at levle 7 guard
s will kill you in one hit - they hit for upwards of 100 dmge and double
attack almost every time.

On Tue, 24 Aug 1999, Court Little wrote:

> From: "Court Little" <courtlend@...>
>
> Actually you can be bound in grobb and its not that hard to do!!!
> You have two options both of which I have done. First you have to sneak past
> the guards to get into the pass! I have had no problems at level 12 sneaking
> past them out fo the water up the right side of the mountain, dont go
> straight through them. Or just have a magic user cast invisible on you (no
> the guards cant see invisible). Once inside the tunnel you have two choices
> 1.) Have a troll who can bind you go into grobb nad make sure that basher
> the guard isnt there, zone in ,bind, and get the hell out!
> 2.) Im not sure if invisible lasts across zones or while binding but head in
> and try that!
> KEY--- make sure you bind right when you step into grobba nd turn to face
> the exit! When you die and basher is there you only have a plsit second, so
> if you are even 4 steps from the door and have to make a 180 you are
> screwed! You need to be facing the exit and one step away.
> I have done this twice and had no problem. ALso when you sneak out I always
> go left up the monutain and out into the water giving the left guard a
> little berth. Byt his method I have never had a problem gtetting out of
> Grobb. except the one time wehn i would zone into the swamp and it would put
> be 10 feet deep into grobb. I would run and jump to zone out and appear 10
> feet deep into grobb, very strange but that happened only once in many
> times! Ya i die alot in gukk.
>
>
